com.breeze.support.test

类 ServletRequestProxy.ServletInputStreamCreater

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • javax.servlet.ServletInputStream
        • com.breeze.support.test.ServletRequestProxy.ServletInputStreamCreater
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    封闭类:
    ServletRequestProxy

    public static class ServletRequestProxy.ServletInputStreamCreater
extends javax.servlet.ServletInputStream
    这是一个servlet的类,不直接使用,便于后面类继承使用
